scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-heatmap.js -- index.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-heatmap.js -c -m -o build/d3-heatmap.min.js && cp src/heatmap.css build/d3-heatmap.css
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-heatmap.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-heatmap.js build/d3-heatmap.min.js build/d3-heatmap.css
